mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employee( cod, name, password, department_cod, emp_position, regdate, email, tel, birthdate, gender ) VALUES( (SELECT e.cod FROM () e), #{name}, #{password}, #{departmentCod}, #{empPosition}, #{regdate}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{birthdate}, #{gender} );
mapper.sql: SELECT CONCAT( 'emp', LPAD( (MAX( CAST( SUBSTRING(cod,4) AS UNSIGNED ) )+1 ), 3,0)) AS cod FROM employee
mapper.select: SELECT e.cod, e.name, e.gender, e.birthdate, e.tel, e.email, d.cod as dept_cod, d.name as dept_name, e.emp_position, d.wrkname, d.location, e.regdate, e.quitdate, e.quit_reason, e.password FROM employee e JOIN department d ON e.department_cod = d.cod;
